deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 23 mins
features: 🔥【High Quality Fireplace】- ROZATO Tabletop Fire Pit is durable enough for a long time use with a design of a solid steel base and tempered glass panes. It is easy to assemble with no install tools required. Just add the fuel and light it up for an instant fire.
🔥【The Perfect Smores Maker Kit】- With 3 extendable roasting sticks and a bamboo serving board included, this tabletop fireplace is the perfect smores maker and perfect gift for those smores lovers.

🔥【Great Home Decor Choice】- With it's unique design, this firepit makes the perfect modern home and outdoor decor clearance for your living room coffee table, dining room, patio, balcony, backyard, garden or front porch

🔥【Portable & Easy to Use】- This portable fire pit weighs about four pounds and reaches flames 8-12 inches high. Clean burning fuel with no ash, soot, or smoke. It's small size makes it perfect for you to take it with you wherever you go whether it's indoors or outdoors. This table top fire pit bowl runs on bioethanol fuel or isopropyl alcohol which is NOT included in package but is easy to find at your nearest convenience store.

🔥【Perfect Gift for Any Occasion】- Want to Find a High End Gift for an Affordable Price? Choose ROZATO. This Entire Set Makes the Perfect Gifts for Women, Gifts for Mom, Gifts for Her, Housewarming Gift, Wedding Gifts, Birthday Gifts or Christmas Gift
body.description: ROZATO Tabletop Fireplace Fill your Home with Warmth and Love ROZATO Tabletop Fireplace fueled by Bioethanol fuel or rubbling alcohol can be used indoors or outdoors. It is a perfect alternative to a traditional log or gas stove. It is light and portable, so you can take and place it wherever you want. The warm atmosphere they create makes them perfect for setting the mood for a relaxing evening - or even a romantic dinner! Enjoy the atmosphere of a real fire with out the mess Buy Them Once, Enjoy Them For Years To Come! Dimensions: 13.8 x 7.2 x 5.8 Inches Weight: 3.8 Pounds Maximum Burning Time: 30-60+ Min Fuel: Bioethanol Fuel or 70%-95% Isopropyl Alcohol

It is a perfect alternative to a traditional log or gas stove. It is light and portable, so you can take and place it wherever you want. Dimensions: 13.8 x 7.2 x 5.8 Inches Weight: 3.8 Pounds Maximum Burning Time: 30-60+ Min Fuel: Bioethanol Fuel or 70%-95% Isopropyl Alcohol

Great for Indoors Illuminate your dining or living room with a warm, pleasant, and relaxing glow. It's the perfect choice for the center of your dinner table. Enjoy a romantic night with this tabletop fireplace. Perfect for S'Mores With 3 extendable roastings sticks and bamboo serving board included, our product is the perfect S'mores Maker. Gather around with your family and enjoy roasting marshmallows. No more going through the struggle of creating a traditional log fire or roasting marshmallows through stove. Suitable for your outdoor patio Create an outdoor living room where you'll enjoy the warmth of a roaring flame. Gathering around a backyard tabletop fire pit with friends or family is one of life’s simplest yet greatest pleasures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ROZATO Tabletop Fire Pit: A Cozy Gift for Warm Memories
reviews.reviewText: I recently gifted the ROZATO Tabletop Fire Pit to a good friend who just bought a new apartment and made a career/location change from Minneapolis, Minnesota to Boulder, Colorado, and it turned out to be a stellar choice. This mini fireplace bowl not only adds warmth but also comes with a delightful s'mores maker kit, making it a unique and cherished present for their new apartment.The portable design allows them to place it effortlessly on their patio, balcony, or even indoors, transforming any space into a cozy retreat. The mini size is perfect for tabletop use, making it a versatile decor piece that enhances the ambiance of their new living space.The s'mores maker kit was a big hit, adding a layer of fun and nostalgia to their space, creating a focal point for laughter and shared memories. The quality of the materials impressed my friend and her boyfriend, ensuring a delightful s'mores-making experience for both of them during many countless nights together.My friend couldn't stop raving about how it added a magical touch to their outdoor evenings. The dancing flames and the crackling sound create an enchanting ambiance, making it perfect for intimate dinners or relaxing evenings under the stars. The warmth it brings extends beyond the physical; it fosters a sense of comfort and connection, turning their new house into a home.The tabletop fire pit is not just a seasonal gift. Its versatility allows for year-round use, providing a source of comfort in chilly evenings and a charming centerpiece during warmer months. The thoughtful design of the fire pit aligns with various occasions, from cozy nights into celebratory gatherings.Assembly was a breeze, and the overall construction of the tabletop fire pit is robust. The stainless-steel burner ensures a clean and smoke-free burn, allowing them to enjoy the warmth without any hassle. It has become a centerpiece for their gatherings, sparking conversations and creating a cozy atmosphere.After this experience, I'm planning on making the ROZATO Tabletop Fire Pit my go-to housewarming gift. It's not just a decor piece; it's a source of warmth, charm, and shared moments for my friends as they embark on new chapters in their lives. The delightful design and practicality make it an excellent choice for welcoming someone into their new space.In conclusion, if you're looking for a thoughtful and unique housewarming gift, the ROZATO Tabletop Fire Pit is a standout choice. Its charm, portability, and the added joy of the s'mores maker kit make it a gift that will be remembered and appreciated in the years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Assessment After One Use
reviews.reviewText: We’ve only used it once but, I have to say, it worked very well. Simple to set up, easy to put away after making several s’mores. Flame burned super hot. The unit, as a whole, seems very well designed and built, I would HIGHLY recommend getting one, if you’re looking to make s’mores inside, and who doesn’t need that?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely accent for the patio
reviews.reviewText: This tabletop firepit is perfect for our patio. Assembly was quick and easy and the flame is perfect, guarded from the wind by glass panels. Isopropyl alcohol is the perfect, inexpensive fuel. Great value and the item appears well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Perfect for balcony
reviews.reviewText: Love this. Easy to use and set up. Perfect on apartment balcony.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend, who loves campfires. Unfortunately, we don't have much space for one at our apartment, so I thought this would be a great alternative.He was so excited about it and loves using it. It looks great on our coffee table. The flames are contained, but do get a bit higher than the sides, so may not be great for those with kids or animals. It also takes a lot of rubbing alcohol to keep it going, which can be a bit inconvenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for smores
reviews.reviewText: We had a Nostalgia smore maker and my daughter and her friend were disappointed in the performance. They pulled out a torch for cooking to get their marshmallows charred. Bought this and it was delivered fast and it looks beautiful on my dining room table. It has everything you need to roast marshmallows and it also gives off a warm heat on those frosty nights. Which is wonderful at dinner. I can’t count how many times we have used it, because we have used it so often. Unlike the Nostalgia, in which we maybe used 3 times in 5 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a gift and bought one for myself. This is a beautiful and easy to use item. Worth every penny spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome! for the cost!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really cool fire pit to use where ever, we have been using it on our center counter top and it is really nice , we both love it, ps, buy the good fuel, i found on amazon and when u fill it to the pointer that says max, it will burn for an hour or more, and the smores kit it comes with is great! we made a few so far.
